response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is not just a possession but a symbol of excellence and innovation. I am offering it to you at a special price of $500,000, which I believe reflects its true worth and the potential it could bring to your life or business. Please consider this offer carefully, as it represents a significant investment in something truly exceptional. I look forward to discussing the details further with you.", "product_price": 500000}
